intents.name: swap_token
intents.description: User wants to swap cryptocurrency from one type of coin to another.

details.name: chain_id
details.description: The id of chain according to the name. Here is the mapping of chain name and chain id: Ethereum: 1, BNB Chain: 56, BNB Chain Testnet: 97, Polygon: 137, Moonbeam Testnet: 1287, Cronos: 25, Cronos Testnet: 338, Mumbai Testnet: 80001, Avalanche FUJI Testnet: 43113, Avalanche: 43114, Fantom Testnet: 4002, Fantom: 250, AminoX Testnet: 13370, Arbitrum Goerli Testnet: 421613, Arbitrum One: 42161, Optimism: 10, Optimism Goerli: 420, zkSync Era: 324, zkSync Era Goerli: 280, ZKsync Era Sepolia: 300, Polygon zkEVM Testnet: 1442, Mantle: 5000, Mantle Testnet: 5001, Manta Testnet: 3441005, Manta: 169, Blast Sepolia: 168587773

details.name: from_token
details.description: The token symbol the user wants to swap from. Here is the mapping of token name and token symbol: Wrapped BNB: WBNB, USDT: USDT, BUSD Token: BUSD, USDC: USDC, DAI: DAI, openANX Token: OAX, CAKE: CAKE, BakeryToken: BAKE, Polkadot Token: DOT, Impossible Finance: IF, Coin98: C98, Impossible Decentralized Incubator Access Token: IDIA, OpenSwap: OSWAP, mOpenSwap: mOSWAP, Project: PRO, mProject: mPRO, mIDIA: mIDIA, Testing: TS, tokenT: TT, JetSwap Token: WINGS, dummy BVR: dBVR, PROJECT: PROJECT, dummy Brickken: BKN

details.name: to_token
details.description: The token symbol the user wants to swap to. Here is the mapping of token name and token symbol: Wrapped BNB: WBNB, USDT: USDT, BUSD Token: BUSD, USDC: USDC, DAI: DAI, openANX Token: OAX, CAKE: CAKE, BakeryToken: BAKE, Polkadot Token: DOT, Impossible Finance: IF, Coin98: C98, Impossible Decentralized Incubator Access Token: IDIA, OpenSwap: OSWAP, mOpenSwap: mOSWAP, Project: PRO, mProject: mPRO, mIDIA: mIDIA, Testing: TS, tokenT: TT, JetSwap Token: WINGS, dummy BVR: dBVR, PROJECT: PROJECT, dummy Brickken: BKN

details.name: from_amount
details.description: The amount of the token the user wants to swap.

intents.name: fetch_file_from_storage
intents.description: User wants to get file from storage. It could be a document, image, video, song, etc.

details.name: file_description
details.description: The description of the file the user wants to get. For example, 'an image of Ken'.

intents.name: fetch_product
intents.description: User wants to get, buy, or inquire a product. It could be a goods, course, service, thing that can be sold, etc.

details.name: product_description
details.description: The description of the product that user wants to get, buy, or inquire. For example, 'multivitamin supplement'.

intents.name: get_crypto_price
intents.description: User wants to get the price of a cryptocurrency. It could be a token, coin, or a currency.

details.name: crypto_symbol
details.description: The token symbol that the user wants to get the price of. For example, 'BTC'.
